posts.title: test_templete
posts.excerpt: Abstract:Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Abstract:Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: WritingRun server1$ hexo serverMore info: ServerGenerate static files1$ hexo generateMore info: GeneratingDeploy to remote sites1$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment

posts.title: test_templete2
posts.excerpt: Abstract: 测试创建博客模板
posts.text: Abstract: 测试创建博客模板this is contentthis is sub title“百度”二字，来自于八百年前南宋词人辛弃疾的一句词：众里寻他千百度。这句话描述了词人对理想的执着追求。1999年底，身在美国硅谷的李彦宏看到了中国互联网及中文搜索引擎服务的巨大发展潜力，抱着技术改变世界的梦想，他毅然辞掉硅谷的高薪工作，携搜索引擎专利技术，于 2000年1月1日在中关村创建了百度公司。
